articles.author: Guardian staff reporter
articles.title: Niger coup leaders warn against military intervention as west African leaders set to meet - The Guardian
articles.description: Heads of state will meet in Nigeria on Sunday where they will decide on further actions to pressure army leaders to restore constitutional order
articles.content: Military leaders in Niger have warned against any armed intervention in the country, as west African leaders were set to meet on Sunday for an emergency summit to decide on further actions to pressur… [+3058 chars]

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: West African leaders meet over Niger coup, junta warns against intervention - Reuters
